data.title: The Scandinavian Academy Tournament U19 arrives in Marbella
data.meta_description: The Scandinavian Academy Tournament U19 is coming to Marbella, a new international event organised by Marbella Football Center. The tournament will feature the 8 best U19 teams from Denmark, Sweden and Norway. The participants are FK Molde, Strømsgodset IF, FC Kobenhavn, Aalesund FK, Hammarby Fotboll, Esbjerg FB, BK Hacken and FC Midtjylland.  The fixture list […]
data.text:
The Scandinavian Academy Tournament U19 is coming to Marbella, a new international event organised by Marbella Football Center. The tournament will feature the 8 best U19 teams from Denmark, Sweden and Norway.

The participants are FK Molde, Strømsgodset IF, FC Kobenhavn, Aalesund FK, Hammarby Fotboll, Esbjerg FB, BK Hacken and FC Midtjylland.

The fixture list for the first matchday is as follows:

29/11/21

12:00 – FC Kobenhavn – Aalesund FK in Dama de Noche.

14:00 – Hammarby Fotboll – Esbjerg FB in Dama de Noche.

16:30 – BK Hacken – Strømsgodset IF in Marbella Football Center.

18:30 – FC Midtjylland – FK Molde in Marbella Football Center.

To this new championship organised by Marbella Football Center the teams have entered according to their position in the local championship. During 10 days we will discover the best of these teams.

Next Sunday 28th of November the ball will start rolling and on the 6th of December the last match will take place. The 8 teams will form two groups and will play against the opponent who has achieved the same position in the other group.

The first two teams will face each other for first and second place, the second two for third and fourth place, and so on.

All matches will be played at the Marbella Football Center and Dama de Noche facilities.
